title: A copy of verses: presented to all my worthy masters and mistrisses in the town of Lambeth. By Thomas Ouldman, bell-man for that part of the parish.
author: Ouldman, Thomas.
publisher: printed for the author Thomas Ouldman,
notes: Verse - "My masters all, I willing am to show,".
A collection of short verses on various themes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
